body: @Holo Learn the difference between fap material and reality you moron. Not defending this at all tho, this is pretty garbage just like most webtoons.
Looks some fucked up stories, im not in

Quality retarded author,this guy win an award for the dumbest ending I see in nhentai webtoon this year.

Korean webtoon will always have melodramatic plot with an over the top retarded ending.

Webtoon's like this make Women seem so terrible. Its basically saying to women yea we all know if you get raped enough times you will soon start to actually enjoy being raped to the point that your gonna want to have sex with the man who raped you out of your own free will. And that none of you have enough courage to come out and say you are being raped to the police or anyone to actually teach this vile piece of a shit a lesson. Its all fine for Hentai but not when its actually supposed to be real literature.

IDK how any one can general read a webtoon like this at all. Fine for a Hentai but not an actual webtoon. Or how the Author can find enjoyment or think this is at all a good work of literature. Like the entire moral of the story is hey if you Rape a women enough times sooner or later hey they are gonna start to enjoy it and actually willingly want to have sex with you. Hell you can even physically abuse them and that's all right because they are women and if you Rape them they will come around to you in the end. And hey you know what you won't even get caught in the end instead you will be allowed to continue raping new women and ruining their lives for a short while until hey they start enjoying it as well.
My Name is Paul Heyman and this "down" here is my client
